sentences.en: He flatly refused to discuss it.
He was invariably willing to discuss the possibilities hypothetically.
sentences.cn: 他总是愿意谈论各种假设的可能性。

sentences.en: I just won't discuss my intimate relationships.
sentences.cn: 我就是不想讨论我的恋爱关系。

sentences.en: I'm not prepared to discuss this over the telephone.
sentences.cn: 我不想在电话里讨论这件事。

sentences.en: If you would like to discuss the matter further, please call me.
sentences.cn: 如果你想进一步讨论此事，请打电话给我。

sentences.en: It was clear that she wanted to discuss some private matter.
It was thought bad form to discuss business on social occasions.
sentences.cn: 在社交场合讨论生意被认为是不礼貌的。

sentences.en: Littman refused to discuss the case publicly.
sentences.cn: 利特曼拒绝公开讨论此案。

sentences.en: Parents will be able to discuss their child's progress with their teacher.
sentences.cn: 家长将可以和老师交流谈论子女的进步情况。

sentences.en: She'd rung up to discuss the divorce.
sentences.cn: 她打过电话来协商离婚事宜。

sentences.en: Students meet biweekly to discuss their experiences.
sentences.cn: 学生们每两周会面一次，讨论他们的见闻。

sentences.en: The Council meets on an ad hoc basis to discuss problems.
sentences.cn: 议会临时安排会议讨论问题。

sentences.en: The magazine's aim is to discuss topical issues within a Christian framework.
sentences.cn: 该杂志的宗旨是在基督教框架下讨论时下的热门话题。

sentences.en: They will discuss how to bail the economy out of its slump.
sentences.cn: 他们将讨论如何使经济走出低谷。

sentences.en: This topic will be discussed in Chapter 4.
sentences.cn: 该主题将在第四章进行详述。

sentences.en: We will discuss these three areas in depth.
sentences.cn: 我们将深入探讨这3个领域。

sentences.en: We'll discuss this when you're in a better frame of mind.
sentences.cn: 你心情好些时我们再讨论这件事。

sentences.en: You will not discuss this matter with anyone.

trans.tran_en: to talk about something with another person or a group in order to exchange ideas or decide something

trans.tran_cn: 讨论， 商议， 议论
